item.title: Blog Setup Complete
item.description: The blog setup using zola is pretty much complete. The only thing left is a commenting system, but in the meantime, while I’m sorting that out, readers can get in touch via Contact Me. After that there is just some tidying up and aesthetic niceties. I would like to get the About and the Contact Me pages off the front page – they’re accessible from the menu bar at the top anyway.

item.title: Starting Out
item.description: This is a new blog using the Hugo static website generator. It’s written in Go, which I don’t know, but it seems pretty easy to use without having to know the ins-and-outs of Go. Let’s go (<ahem>). Test highlighting with some code examples: Bash if i < 10; then i = 10 fi Looks good. Had to change the markdown from two tabs to eight spaces for i = 10 though, otherwise the indentation wasn’t recognised.
